QuestData.Title: Shrine of the Dawn
QuestData.Description: The "children" you seek are not actually children but grown pandaren, despite what their elders might claim. Their love will not be held in check by the feuds of their families.$b$bYou will find both Syra and Lo at the Shrine of the Dawn, ever seeking an answer to their dilemma amongst the pandriarchs of old.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Shrine of the Dawn for Syra Goldendraft.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Syra Goldendraft at Shrine of the Dawn in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh stranger! Please tell me you can help us. They really hurt my Lo.
